sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useItems } from '../contexts/ItemContext'; import { ShoppingBag, Plus, TrendingUp, Users, Heart, Calendar, ArrowRight, Eye, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const { items, fetchItems, deleteItem } = useItems(); const [userItems, setUserItems] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchItems().then(() => { setLoading(false); }); }, [fetchItems]); useEffect(() => { if (user && items.length > 0) { const filtered = items.filter(item => item.uploader === user._id); setUserItems(filtered); } }, [user, items]); const handleDeleteItem = async (itemId) => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this item?')) { await deleteItem(itemId); } }; const stats = [ { title: 'Total Items', value: userItems.length, icon: , color: 'bg-blue-500', textColor: 'text-blue-600' }, { title: 'Active Swaps', value: '0', icon: , color: 'bg-green-500', textColor: 'text-green-600' }, { title: 'Community Members', value: '1.2k+', icon: , color: 'bg-purple-500', textColor: 'text-purple-600' }, { title: 'Items Saved', value: '0', icon: , color: 'bg-red-500', textColor: 'text-red-600' } ]; const recentActivity = [ { type: 'item_added', title: 'Added new item', description: 'Blue Denim Jacket', time: '2 hours ago', icon: }, { type: 'swap_request', title: 'Swap request received', description: 'From Sarah M.', time: '1 day ago', icon: } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.fullname}! Here's what's happening with your account.

Add Item
{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* My Items */}

My Items

View all
{loading ? (
) : userItems.length > 0 ? (
{userItems.slice(0, 5).map((item) => (
{item.images && item.images[0] ? ( ) : ( )}

{item.title}

{item.category} â€¢ {item.size}

{item.condition}

))} {userItems.length > 5 && (
View all {userItems.length} items
)}
) : (

No items yet

Start by adding your first item to the community.

Add Your First Item
)}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.length > 0 ? (
{recentActivity.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.icon}

{activity.title}

{activity.description}

{activity.time}

))}
) : (

No activity yet

Your recent activity will appear here.

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Add New Item View My Swaps Edit Profile
); }; export default Dashboard;
